intro:
I’m Shang-Poh Yu.
Creative Problem Solver,
Interactive Designer.
quote: ( but you’re welcome to call me Shang )

about.title: About
about.intro: As a designer, I like to push the boundaries of possibility and expectation when it comes to creating innovative interactive experiences.

paragraphs.paragraph: I am a 26-year-old Taiwanese-New Zealander, currently working at Resn as an interactive designer with increasing art direction responsibilities. Design and creative problem solving are two of my biggest passions.

A high priority of mine is to learn. I love to discover how things work and why they are created. I am confident in my ability to create high quality, effective outputs with attention to detail. My greatest assets are my ideas and my ability to think conceptually. My approach to creating innovative experiences is to always consider the end user. As a result, I produce targeted, effective and personable outcomes that resonate with audiences.
